long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy extension to help manage your Umbraco site with ease. Providing links to important community resources for extra help.

In the options you can choose to open the backoffice in a new tab and hide the community links.

Source code is available on GitHub and contributions are welcome. The "Website" link for this extension goes to the GitHub repo.

Release notes:

2.0.0 New look and feel
2.1.0 The MiniProfiler is back, enable it in the options
2.2.0 Opening in new tabs is now available for frontend as well see issue #2 on GitHub
2.3.0 Adds a button when an ASP.NET or dotnet error page appears (also known as YSOD), the button will pop off a google search in a new window
